
An intern reused a prime across RSA keys to encrypt a secret. Recover the flag from the ciphertext: ciphertext1: 26527012219084294291308892940433743097368337595336429063726932658722390521540700058102636944854912649182969564307680265411010325835051229893167089011225877504099658427582671440502100527497348865281257864189616979617520005033828767, ciphertext2: 75683669935670149365530529362406627051091268251550188581696022233779889039288564951796422098432789574800041223248747693390178286614865668227614599620434725450088476928947179688326793020408432795679625770126114490108829053111222429


The flag format is flag{...}
n1=407887081644318804543800534389331748870773620879171516975743725411232475697553018072260805729179883519962140187670410854781816280950974739275840597597848748159700337278719076609296469333893458493474972716990145745834238885631171267, n2=408483668033520695880458269949885002694213451406773854105630413662663379902573084722038276583607621223714436475425177451322436746674351744255868102174865912217058504379480454549488794320027519710319763481798339404389501591452750293, e=162120863502399787094140551889265057700794845559014503209454533318248927113801144626125428636912717238590121718071994406517848787348426663010254846133455048968964096213477175895578524854776749850152748808230418278756596187054031659

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{mjr255re}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 26527012219084294291308892940433743097368337595336429063726932658722390521540700058102636944854912649182969564307680265411010325835051229893167089011225877504099658427582671440502100527497348865281257864189616979617520005033828767, ciphertext2: 75683669935670149365530529362406627051091268251550188581696022233779889039288564951796422098432789574800041223248747693390178286614865668227614599620434725450088476928947179688326793020408432795679625770126114490108829053111222429
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=407887081644318804543800534389331748870773620879171516975743725411232475697553018072260805729179883519962140187670410854781816280950974739275840597597848748159700337278719076609296469333893458493474972716990145745834238885631171267, n2=408483668033520695880458269949885002694213451406773854105630413662663379902573084722038276583607621223714436475425177451322436746674351744255868102174865912217058504379480454549488794320027519710319763481798339404389501591452750293, e=162120863502399787094140551889265057700794845559014503209454533318248927113801144626125428636912717238590121718071994406517848787348426663010254846133455048968964096213477175895578524854776749850152748808230418278756596187054031659
